## Suggester.invalidPrefixCharacters property

A regex expression used to invalidate the text directly before the match.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
invalidPrefixCharacters?: RegExp | string;
```

## Remarks

This has preference over the `validPrefixCharacters` option and when it is defined only it will be looked at in determining whether a prefix is valid.
